Syria Collection AD.MC.036
5 paige_boxes
1940s-1980s 1 - 3 4
Scope and Contents
Acquired from photographer Xenia Nikolskaya, the Syria Collection includes 537 photographs including black and white gelatin silver prints and color photographs. The images document the social and cultural life of Syria from the 1940's to the 1980's. They portray religious ceremonies, daily life, street scenes of Damascus, archaeological sites, schools, picnics, family trips, costume parties, historic sites, and landscapes.
